attributes.action: MAKE THE GOVERMENT  GIVE US A REFERENDAM ON BRINGING BACK THE DEATH PENALTY,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THERE IS FAR TOO MANY MURDERS BEING COMMITED.ESPECIALY TO OUR YOUNG PEOPLE.ITS ABOUT TIME SOMETHING WAS DONE ABOUT IT.AT THE MOMENT THRER IS NO DETERANT TO THESE UNLAWFUL PEOPLE,AND THE GOOD LAW ABIDING CITIZENS OF THIS COUNTRY ARE GETTING TO FRIGHTENED TO LEAVE THEIR HOMES.SOMETHING MUST BE DONE.UNFORTUNATLY A SMACK ON THE HAND IS NOT ENOUGH.WE NEED POSSITIVE ACTION NOW.THE GOVERMENT NEED TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS TERRIBLE PROBLEM.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/strikeoutmurder/
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
